properties.name: Source
properties.description: The source of the compound, e.g. 'Enamine', 'E-Molecule', 'Sigma-Aldrich', 'ACME'

synonym_types.name: EPA Compound ID
synonym_types.description: The EPA assignedcompound ID of the compound, e.g. '1234567890'

synonym_types.name: CAS
synonym_types.description: The CAS Registry Number of the compound, e.g. '1234567890'

synonym_types.name: USAN
synonym_types.description: The USAN name of the compound, e.g. '1-Methyl-4-phenylpyridinium chloride'

synonym_types.name: IUPAC Name
synonym_types.description: The IUPAC name of the compound, e.g. '1-Methyl-4-phenylpyridinium chloride'
